owunta shri lankawa pilibanda niwaradi pahadili chithrayak bala ganimata da haki wana bawa samaranayaka mahatha pawasiya.adala ratawal 54 ka niyojithayan menma wenath wideshiya niyojithayan menma sancharakayan da me samuluwa haraha shri lankawata paminena nisa shri lankawe sundara sthana ha aithihasika sthana daka bala ganimata awasthawa labadimen da ?shri lankawe sancharaka wyaparayata mahangu awasthawak wana bawath pawasiya.me samuluwa haraha labena prathilabha samanga shri lankawata digu gamanakata mula pura athayi hethema kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

kapruka purawara wadasatahana pallama dikapruka purawara wadasatahana yatathe pallama pradeshaye pradeshiya kottasaya thula pol wagawa prachalitha kirime wadasatahana pol sanwardhana saha janatha wathu kalamanakarana amathi jagath pushpakumara mahathage pradhanathwayen sidu kere.kaduwela 250 kata niwasa nayakaduwela mathiwarana kottasaye adu aadayamlabhi pawul 250kata niwasa naya pradanaya kirima injineru sewa niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathi wimal wirawansha mahathage pradhanathwayen pasugiya 9 wanida sidu kerini.kaka dupatha ala pilisakara wewasara 30 kata pasu kaka dupatha ala margaya nedarlantha rajaye aadhara yatathe pasugiya 07 prathisanskaranaya kerini.sahal piti aahara aapanashalawa palawaththesahal piti aahara nishpadana samanga deshiya aahara prachalitha kirime aramunin idikala palamu aapana shalawa eet rayit baththaramulla palawaththa janawasa puhunu ha sanwardhana madhyasthana bhumiyedi pasugiya 10 wanida wiwrutha kerini.tharuna sewa ampara karyalaya arekalmune sayindamaradu pradeshaye idikarana lada jathika tharuna sewa sabhawe ampara disthrik karyalaya saha jathika wruththiya puhunu madhyasthanaya pasugiyada yauwana katayuthu saha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha athin wiwrutha kerini.
